pages.text: The ebony forest has a lot of useful materials.$(br)It also has a much higher $(#9f00fe)soul $(#3b005e)concentration$() than any other biome.$(br2)Unfortunately it also has a $(#545454)thick fog$(), with no way to remove it.
A natural onyx, much more powerful than an artificial one
A log that gained some peculiar properties given the soul concentration, maybe you're able to use its eye?
A wood type found all over the forest, has a black tint, can be made in all wood variants
Stone that has been exposed to the soul, and has absorbed it.$(br2)If only there was an way to artificially infuse it...
